snippet: The girls, two of whom were twin sisters, were in a marked crosswalk when they were struck by a sport utility vehicle Friday evening, the authorities said.
lead_paragraph: The girls, two of whom were twin sisters, were in a marked crosswalk when they were struck by a sport utility vehicle Friday evening, the authorities said.

headline.main: 3 Girls Killed in Hit-and-Run While Trick-or-Treating in Santa Ana
